actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-226.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman under authority of the order of the Senate of 12/17/2011 without amendment. With written report No. 112-123.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 285.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests

official_title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain public land in the Cherokee National Forest in the State of Tennessee, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2011 - Designates specified federal lands in Cherokee National Forest in Tennessee as wilderness and as additions to the National Wilderness Preservation System (NWPS).

titles.title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain public land in the Cherokee National Forest in the State of Tennessee, and for other purposes.
